column2: "Oya oya, ara ara, it's you. It seems Lisa has been off lately."
"Recently, Lisa isn't able to distinguish friend from foe."
"Fufufu, it was like that before, right? Well, now I don't have to hesitate."
"Jokes aside, Lisa really has been feeling off lately."
"Especially being around Dewmans, I simply can't stay still."
"Recently, I've been worried about shooting the wrong person."
"Lisa doesn't like having to do that, it really doesn't suit me."
"If I accidentally shoot someone, it's okay, but if I shoot someone on purpose, I get yelled at."
"It's troublesome and annoying. Why does the world have to be so troublesome?"
"If I could shoot anyone, friend or foe, the world would be much more simple."
